home.heroSubtitle: Duka ryawe rimwe ku byo ukeneye byose: ibiciro byiza, imideli mishya, n'ibicuruzwa byiza. Uhereye kuri mode kugeza kuri elegitoroniki, dufite ibintu birenga 50,000!
home.whyChooseSubtitle: Duharanira gutanga serivisi nziza y'ubucuruzi hamwe n'inyungu zituma twihariye

features.title: Urutonde runini rw'ibicuruzwa
features.description: Sura ibicuruzwa byinshi byujuje ubuziranenge mu byiciro bitandukanye ku biciro byiza

features.title: Umutekano mu kwishyura
features.description: Gura wizeye ukoresheje uburyo bwacu bwo kwishyura butekanye. Umutekano wawe ni wo mwanya wa mbere

features.title: Kwohereza vuba
features.description: Tuzana ibicuruzwa byawe vuba hamwe no gukurikirana mu gihe nyacyo n'uburyo bwo gutanga byoroshye

home.shopByCategorySubtitle: Reba kolekisi yacu nini y'ibicuruzwa mu byiciro bizwi
home.saleTitle: Icyi gicuruzwa cy'itumba - Kugera kuri 50% ku giciro
home.saleSubtitle: Ntucikwe n'igabanyirizo ryacu rinini! Gura ubu ugabanye ku bicuruzwa byinshi.
home.testimonialsSubtitle: Bizwi n'abakiriya benshi bishimye ku isi yose

testimonials.quote: ShopEasy yahinduye burundu uburyo bwo kugura. Kohereza ahora ku gihe kandi ubuziranenge ni bwiza!
testimonials.author: Sarah Johnson

testimonials.quote: Nka muntu ukora cyane, nshimira uko byoroshye kubona ibyo nkeneye. Serivisi yabo y'abakiriya ni nziza.
testimonials.author: Michael Chen

testimonials.quote: Ibiciro ni byiza cyane kandi amahitamo ni menshi. Namaze kubasaba inshuti n'umuryango wanjye bose.
testimonials.author: Emily Rodriguez

home.howItWorksSubtitle: Intambwe zoroshye zo kubona ibyo ukeneye, igihe ubyifuza

steps.title: Ongeramo mu mufuka
steps.description: Hitamo ibintu wongere mu mufuka wawe

newsletter.title: Iyandikishe kuri Newsletter yacu
newsletter.subtitle: Iyandikishe kugirango ubone amakuru yihariye, ibyinjiye bishya, n'ibicuruzwa byiza mu ikayi yawe
newsletter.privacyText: Twirinda ibanga ryawe. Ushobora kwiyandikisha igihe cyose.

supportBlocks.title: Inkunga 24/7
supportBlocks.description: Turi hano kubafasha igihe cyose ufite ikibazo

supportBlocks.title: Kurikirana itegeko ryawe
supportBlocks.description: Kurikirana ibyo waguze kuva mu bubiko kugeza ku rugo rwawe

supportBlocks.title: Politiki yo gusubiza
supportBlocks.description: Kugarura nta nkomyi mu minsi 30 ku bicuruzwa byinshi

footer.subscribeDescription: Iyandikishe kugirango ubone amakuru n'ibyiza byihariye.
Iyandikishe kugirango ubone amakuru n'ibiciro byihariye.

auth.createAccountSubtitle: Hanga konti kugirango ubone ibyiza byihariye by'ubucuruzi.
auth.almostThere: Hafi aho! Ongera ushyiremo aderesi yawe.

signup.passwordHint: Byibuze inyuguti 8 harimo inyuguti nini, nto, nimero na karateri idasanzwe

errors.nameInvalid: Izina rigomba kuba inyuguti hagati ya 2 na 50
errors.emailInvalid: Format ya imeri ntabwo yujuje ibisabwa
errors.passwordLength: Ijambo ry'ibanga rigomba kuba nibura inyuguti 8
errors.passwordPattern: Rigomba kuba ryarimo inyuguti nini, nto, numero na karateri idasanzwe

signup.formErrorsFixMessage: Nyamuneka mukosore amakosa yose mbere yo gukomeza
